name: Fool's Gold (CSchar)
description:
Throw grenades and send boulders through teleporters as you search for treasure deep in the caverns in Fool’s Gold, a puzzle-platformer! You must set up each level so that a boulder will be guided towards the exit, allowing you passage through - with one catch. Your character will die at the end of each level! Only a fool would embark on such a quest…

Controls: Arrow Keys / WASD - Move and Jump
Space - Pick up
R - Restart

Graphics, sound, programming by me. 

Feedback welcomed.
